Sonia is asking for a new loan in order to continue working since she depends on her business to support her family. She will buy new clothes like blouses, underwear, and other items with which she hopes to better serve her clients. 

With the previous loan she grew her business. Her business has better conditions, and her family’s quality of life has also improved. Since she has a good credit history, she’s hoping that through this loan she can continue getting more chances to invest in the business.

loans.use: to buy new clothes like blouses, underwear, and other items.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, vive con su familia, es una mujer trabajadora, se dedica a vender tortillas y tiene un puesto de frutas y verduras, está solicitando un préstamo para seguir trabajando y mantener el negocio, pues considera que a través de el podrá ir creciendo en el mercado, manteniendo la fidelidad de los clientes, ella se comprara maíz, verduras y frutas frescas, para la elaboracion de tortillas y la venta de verduras y frutas que administra.
Ella tiene como objetivo, el trabajar con prestamos, para poder superarse, ha tenido anteriormente tres prestamos quelos ha manejado muy bien.
texts.en:
Concepción lives with her family and is a hardworking woman. She sells tortillas and has a fruit and vegetable stand. She is applying for a loan in order to continue working and maintaining her business. She believes that through financing she will be able to grow in the marketplace by maintaining customer loyalty. 

She will buy corn, vegetables and fresh fruits so that she can make tortillas and sell vegetables and fruits at the stand she runs. Her objective is to work with loans so that she is able to succeed. She has had three previous loans, which she has managed very well.

loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables and fresh fruits.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, su intención es crecer en la granja comprándose pollos de engorde pequeños para engordarlos, esto aumentara su potencial y espera poder aumentar con ello sus ventas.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior fue mejorar las instalaciones de la granja, comprandose los materiales y ademas logro crecer en la granja, teniendo el fortalecimiento en sus ventas, y los ingresos económicos en su familia han sido mejor.
texts.en:
José decided to apply for a new loan so that he could invest in his business. His intention is to grow his farm by purchasing small chickens for fattening. This will increase his potential in hopes of generating more sales.

His previous loan resulted in improvements to the facilities on his farm. He purchased materials and was able to grow his farm, which strengthened his sales and improved his family's financial earnings.

loans.use: to buy small chickens for fattening.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, es un hombre luchador y responsable vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 14, 12, 9 y 7 años de edad ellos estudian y dependen de él, José se dedica a las actividades agropecuarias como la siembra de granos básicos, también en la albañilería esto se lo enseño su padre, lo ha venido realizando desde que tiene su propia familia.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en insecticidas y fertilizantes para la siembra de maíz y frijol en dos manzanas de terreno esta compra le ayudara a fortalecer y proteger de plagas el cultivo. con la esperanza de tener una cosecha sana para poder comercializarla. uno de sus riesgos precisamente son las plagas y los cambios climáticos.
El objetivo de José es obtener mejores ganancias por la venta de sus cosechas y que asi mismo le permita darle a sus hijos la alimentación, educación y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Jose is a responsible and tenacious man who lives with his wife and their 4 children, aged 14, 12, 9 and 7.  His children are in school and are dependent upon him.  Jose works farming staple grains and he also works in construction, a trade he learned from his father.  He has been doing this work ever since he started his own family.

He is requesting a loan to purchase insecticides and fertilizers for his corn and bean crops that are planted on two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land.  This purchase will help him to strengthen his crops and protect them from pests.  He hopes to have a healthy harvest so that he can sell his crops.  In doing this, he faces the risk of weather events and of pests.

Jose's goal is to get better earnings from the sale of his harvests, so that he can provide his children with food, education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy insecticides and fertilizers for his corn and bean crops

loans.name: Jose Ovidio

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y siembra de granos básicos es una persona honrada y responsable, vive con sus dos hijos de 9 y 5 años de edad los dos dependen económicamente de el, el trabajo lo realiza todos los días desde las cinco de la mañana asta las cuatro de la tarde desde hace 15 años.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insecticidas y fertilizantes para iniciar la siembra de maíz y frijol, esta compra le proporcionara mejores oportunidades de obtener una cosecha abundante y libre de plagas para poder comercializarlas.
Su aspiración es ir creciendo año con año en el negocio hacerlo mas rentable que le permita ganar mas dinero para su familia.
texts.en:
José raises cattle and plants staple grains. He is an honest and responsible person. He lives with his two children, ages 9 and 5, who are economically dependent on him. He has been working every day from five in the morning until four in the afternoon for the past 15 years.

He is applying for a loan to purchase insecticides and fertilizer in order to start planting corn and beans. This purchase will give him a better chance of obtaining an abundant harvest that is pest-free so that he can market it.

His aspiration is to continue growing his business year after year and making it more profitable so that he can earn more money for his family.

.

loans.use: to buy insecticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La Sra. Mercedes tiene 27 años. Es madre soltera de un niño aun pequeño. Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, calzados deportivos, juegos de sabanas, cortinas, toallas y otro tipo de productos para el hogar.
Realiza estas ventas  en varias zonas del país desde el año 2010. Anteriormente trabajaba como vendedora en una boutique, pero en este nuevo trabajo puede generar mejores ingresos para ofrecer una vida más digna a su hijo.
Mercedes necesita de este crédito para adquirir frazadas, edredones y prendas para la temporada de invierno que inicia, pues ya recibe los pedidos de su clientela y debe cumplir con ellos. Ella anhela poder tener su casa propia, pues vive con sus padres, y también desea poder garantizar un buen vivir a su hijo, brindándole todo lo básicamente necesario.
texts.en:
Sra. Mercedes is 27 years old and a single mother with a small child. She sells articles of clothing, sports shoes, bedding sets, curtains, towels, and other types of household products. Mercedes has been generating sales in different parts of the country since 2010. She previously worked as a saleswoman at a boutique, but this new job allowed her to generate more income and offer a more decent life to her son.

Mercedes needs this loan to acquire blankets, quilts, and articles of clothing for the winter season that is about to begin. She has already received orders from her customers and needs to fulfill them. Her wish is to have a house of her own since she lives with her parents. She also wants to guarantee a good life for her son and provide all of his basic needs.

loans.use: to buy blankets, quilts, and articles of clothing.

loans.name: Maria Paz

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y a la elaboración de pan vive actualmente con su esposo y su hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad, este oficio ella lo aprendió por la misma necesidad económica desde hace 6 años.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima azúcar, maíz, manteca, levadura, huevos y leña, esto le ayudara a la producción tanto de tortillas como de pan con el objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
La aspiración de María es poder tener una maquina que le ayude a procesar los materiales para la elaboración, del pan ya que esto le ayudara a agilizar su trabajo y poder producir mas, dandole la oportunidad de proveer a su familia lo necesario y mejorar su futuro.
texts.en:
María sells tortillas and makes bread. Currently she lives with her husband and two children, ages 7 and 5. She learned these tasks six years ago due to economic necessity.

She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as sugar, corn, butter, yeast, eggs and firewood. This will help in the production of tortillas as well as bread, with the objective of improving her income.

María’s aspiration is to be able to own a machine that will help her process the materials for bread making because this will help speed up production and enable her to produce more, giving her the opportunity to provide the necessities for, and improve the future of, her family. 

.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as sugar, corn, butter, yeast, eggs and firewood.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É professora, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, blocos, e outro) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e construir um murro, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a ampliar a sua casa e concluir os Estudos.
texts.en:
Maria is married and the mother of three children, all of whom go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She is a teacher.  She will use her current loan to buy construction material (cement, sand, stone, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to finish her home and construct a wall, for which she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenges are making her home bigger and finishing her studies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, refrescos, amendoim, e outro) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja comprar uma viatura para transportar os produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é garantir o sustento dos Estudos dos filhos ate a Universidade e manter o negócio forte.
texts.en:
Jose is married and is the father of two children who both go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He owns his own business selling basic goods, and with the current loan, he will buy products (rice, beans, soft drinks, peanuts, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to buy a vehicle to transport his products, for which he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is guaranteeing the educational funds for his children until college and maintaining a strong business.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, beans, soft drinks, peanuts, etc.)

loans.name: Delmira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Delmira, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, ella es ama de casa y apoya a su esposo en las labores agrícolas ya que de ello obtiene lo necesario para el sustento familiar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como el abono, insecticidas y pesticidas, esta compra le ayudara a proporcionarle a su esposo lo necesario para la ejecución de la siembra.
La aspiración de Delmira es que sus siembras sean productivas y poder trabajar para mejorar las condiciones y el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delmira lives with her husband and three children.  She takes care of the home and supports her husband in his agricultural work so that he can provide what's necessary to support their family.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies such as manure, insecticides and pesticides.  This purchase will help her to provide her husband with those things necessary for sowing.

Delmira's aspiration is that her crops will be productive and that she can work to improve her conditions and her children's future.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Belinha

texts.pt:
Divorciada e mãe de 6 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 4 netos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos, e com o presente empréstimo pretende legalizar o terreno e comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, blocos, ferro, e outro) para dar inicio a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a obra da sua casa e fazer crescer o seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos de investimentos.
texts.en:
Belinha is divorced and is the mother of six children, who are all adults.  She lives in her own family with her children and also supports four grandchildren who live with her.  She owns her own business selling various products.  With the current loan, she will pay the legal fees for her land and buy construction materials (sand cement, bricks, iron, etc.) to start work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to finish her home and to grow her business.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is having insufficient investment funds.

loans.use: to pay for the legal fees for her land and to buy construction materials (sand, cement, bricks, iron, etc.).

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filha que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhas enviando dinheiro. 	
É negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de refeições e bebidas, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, cervejas, carne de porco, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da mercadoria.
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e apoiar a filha nos Estudos até se formar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é construir uma barraca no quintal da sua casa para melhor gerir o seu negocio.
texts.en:
Carolina is the single mother of one daughter who is in school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two nieces by sending them money.  She owns her own business selling meals and drinks.  With her current loan, she will buy products (soft drinks, beer, pork, etc.) to increase the quantity of her mechandise.

In the future, she hopes to make her business grow and to support her daughter with her education until she completes college.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is building a stand in her yard to manage her business better.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (soft drinks, beer, pork, etc.).

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Casada e não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
É professora, e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material (cimento, pedra, areia, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a casa e mobilar.
texts.en: Amelia is married and doesn't have children.  She lives in her own home with her family and supports two nephews who live with her.  She is a teacher.  With her current loan, she will buy construction materials (cement, stone, sand, etc.) to continue work on her home.  In the future, she wants to finish her home to improve her family's comfort.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenges are finishing her home and furnishing it.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Edlyn

texts.en:
Edlyn is 27 years old and married. She has four children, and two of her children are currently in school. Edlyn works very hard to provide for them.

Edlyn runs a wholesale business that sells sugar and cooking oil in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Edlyn has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Edlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her tailoring business.

Evangeline has been in this business for 10 years. Evangeline earns more income from food vending.

Evangeline has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of some loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 36 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evelyn has been raising pigs for three years and also earns some additional income from buying and selling crabs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Gina is 40 years old. Three of her children are in school.

Gina has a food vending business in the Philippines. Gina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Gina has been in this business for two years. In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Ma. Karen

texts.en:
Ma. Karen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

Ma. Karen has been in this business for four years. Ma. Karen earns more income from fishing.

Ma. Karen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Salve

texts.en:
Salve is a married parent of six children who works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines and earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Salve is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and piglets for her pig fattening business.

Salve has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional feed and piglets

loans.name: Surja Maya

texts.en:
Surja Maya is 50 years-old. She is Married and has two children ages 25 and 26. In 2000, she established her tea shop business. Working seven days a week and twelve hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy food materials for her business. In the future, Surja plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu, or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal. Called a chiya pasal, these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy food materials

loans.name: Mayramkul

texts.ru:
Майрамкуль 61 год, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Майрамкуль с 1982 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Майрамкуль,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом и 13 овец, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 5,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамкуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Майрамкуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Mayramkul is 61 years old, married, and has 5 children. She has been raising livestock since 1982, having started her business with an initial investment of 20,000 som. Thanks to her hard work, Mayramkul's herd presently has 1 dairy cow with offspring and 13 sheep. She earns roughly 5,000 som (KGS) per month by selling milk to the local dairy plant.

In order to continue developing her business, Mayramkul has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further increasing the size of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Rasmi

texts.en:
Rasmi is 24 years old.  She is married and has two children who are five and two years old.  In 2011, she established her grocery store business.  Working seven days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid four loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business. In the future, Rasmi plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Muhtabar

texts.ru: Мухтабар проживает в городе Чкаловск. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она семь лет как занимается торговлей. На сегодняшний день Мухтабар занимается торговлей парфюмерии, косметики и хозяйственных товаров. Она берет кредит для покупки детских игрушек и парфюмерии.
texts.en: Muhtabar lives in the city of Chkalovsk. She is 54 years old, married, and has three children. She has been in the retail business for the past seven years. Currently, Muhtabar sells perfumes and cosmetics, as well as household goods. She is taking this loan to purchase children's toys and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy children's toys and perfumes

loans.name: Nurjan

texts.ru:
Нуржан 40 лет, одна воспитывает 2 детей. Нуржан с 2005 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Нуржан,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова с приплодом и 20 овец, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуржан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Нуржан планирует частично вложить в ремонт квартиры, и часть - в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Nurjan is 40 years old and a single mother of 2 children. She has been raising livestock since 2005, having launched her business with an initial sum of 5,000 som. Thanks to her persistent work, Nurjan's herd currently has 1 dairy cow with offspring and 20 sheep, while her income from sales of milk to the local dairy plant amounts to around 15,000 som (KGS) per month.

In order to continue developing her business, Nurjan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy additional goats and sheep. She plans to use a part of her profits from this loan to repair her apartment, and to reinvest the remainder into her business.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock

loans.name: Almagul

texts.ru:
Алмагул 51 год, вдова, имеет 5 детей. Алмагул с 1992 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Алмагул,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова, 1 телка, и 1 лошадь, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алмагул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Алмагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства за счет постройки большого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Almagul is 51 years old. She is a widow and has 5 children. Almagul has been raising livestock since 1992, having started her business with an initial investment of 10,000 som. Thanks to her persistent work, Almagul's herd currently has 1 dairy cow, 1 heifer, and 1 horse, while her profits from sales of milk to the local dairy plant amount to approximately 10,000 som (KGS) per month.

In order to continue developing her business, Almagul has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional small livestock. She plans to reinvest her profits from this loan into her business by constructing a large barn for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза  трудолюбивая и честная девушка. Она родилась в 1991 году в семье рабочих. Она умная и является студенткой 3-го курса Таджикского Государственного Университета Права Бизнеса и политики. Учится по специальности «экономист- программист» факультета  « Компьютерных технологий и учета».Является председателем Совета девушек факультета. Она активная девушка, участвовала на межфакультетной олимпиаде по математике. В будущем она хочет работать в ООО МЗО «ИМОН Интернешнл». Она хочет получить займ для оплаты обучения и очень надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Shahnoza is a hard-working and honest young woman. She was born in 1991 in a working class family. Shahnoza is an intelligent person and is currently a 3rd-year student at the Tajik State University of Business Law and Policy. She is studying towards a degree in economics and computer programming in the faculty of Computer Technologies and Accounting. Shahnoza is an active young woman - she is the chair of the faculty's committee of female students, and has also participated in the inter-faculty math olympics. In the future, she would like to work at IMON International.

Shahnoza would like to obtain a loan to pay for her education and hopes very much for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university education

loans.name: Ziyo

texts.ru: Зиё проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он более восьми лет занимается скотоводством. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ziyo lives in the Khujand Region. He is 47 years old. He is married, with three children. He has been raising livestock for over eight years. He is taking out a loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru:
Гулсаре 56 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Гулсара с 1995 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Гулсары,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  3 дойные коровы, 5 овец и 2 лошади, ежемесячная прибыль  с продажи молока  местному перерабатывающему заводу составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулсара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 96,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Гулсара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства за счет постройки большого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Gulsara is 56 years old, married, and has 3 children. She has been raising livestock since 1995, having started her business with an initial investment of 20,000 som. Thanks to her hard work, Gulsara's herd currently consists of 3 dairy cows, 5 sheep and 2 horses, while her monthly profits from selling milk to the local dairy plant amount to approximately 15,000 som (KGS).

In order to continue developing her business, Gulsara has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 96,000 som (KGS) to buy additional sheep and goats. She plans to reinvest her profits from this loan into her business by constructing a large barn for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mukhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат 59 лет, замужем, воспитала 2 детей. В  1990 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Мухабат начала свой бизнес в торговле женскими трикотажными вещами на рынке со стартовой суммой 10,000 сом (KGS) . Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Мухабат сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 40,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Мухабат  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135.000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Мухабат планирует частично вложить в закуп стройматериалов для ремонта в доме, и часть – в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Mukhabat is 59 years old, married, and has two children. In 1990, in search of a source of income for her family, Mukhabat began her own business selling women's knitted wear at the market with an initial 10,000 som (KGS) investment. Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Mukhabat succeeded in developing the company, and now earns a monthly income of 40,000 som (KGS). Her inventory is currently limited so Mukhabat turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a 135,000 som (KGS) loan. Mukhabat plans to use part of her profits to buy materials for repairs to her home, and part for business development.

loans.use: expand her inventory

loans.name: Saidrahmon

texts.ru: Саидрахмон проживает в районе Фархор. Ему 26 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Саидрахмон занимается торговлей. В этой области он 18 лет. Он берет кредит для приобретения запчастей телефонов и компьютеров.
texts.en: Saidrahmon lives in the Farkhor region. He is 26 years old, married, and has a child. Saidrahmon has been working in retail for the past 18 years. He is taking this loan to stock up on spare parts for telephones and computers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for phones and computers

loans.name: Ricardo De Las Mercedes

texts.es:
Ricardo, de 48 años de edad es un humilde  comerciante pero muy emprendedor el trabaja como guardia de seguridad, a él le gusta mucho lo que es el deporte y el físico culturismo. Por tal razón desde hace 7 años con mucho esfuerzo y sacrifico puso su pequeño gimnasio que aunque no tenga las maquinas más  modernas pero es de los pocos que existen en su pueblo y el cual Ricardo atiende desde muy tempranas horas, su esposa  y sus hijos lo ayudan administrar el negocio cuando le toca cubrir el turno en su trabajo. El entusiasmado nos cuenta que puso este negocio porque le gusta el deporte y sobre todo el físico culturismo que considera algo sano de mucha recreación para los jóvenes de su pueblo.
El requiere el crédito para compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda que es  donde tiene su gimnasio, el cual necesita una mejor presentación para ser más atractivo para sus clientes. Una de sus metas es comprar más maquinas de hacer ejercicio y promover mas el deporte.
texts.en:
Ricardo, aged 48, is a humble but very enterprising entrepreneur.  He works as a security guard, and what he really enjoys is sports and body building.  For this reason,  he started a small gym seven years ago with much effort and sacrifice.  It still does not have the most modern machines, but it is one of the few gyms that exists in his village and Ricardo works there from the very early hours of the morning.  His wife and children help him run the business when he has to cover his work-shift.

He enthusiastically tells us that he started this business because he enjoys sports and above all body building, which he considers to be very healthy recreation for the young people in his village.  He is requesting the loan to purchase construction materials to improve the infrastructure of his home, which is where he has his gym.  He needs it to look better so as to be more attractive for his clients. 

One of his goals is to purchase more exercise machines and to promote sports more.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for his gym.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гулмире 48 лет, воспитала 2 дочерей. Гулмира с 2000 года работала в финансовой организации, заработная плата была низкой. После развода с мужем, оставшись единственным кормильцем для своих детей, Гулмира решилась уехать на заработки в Россию, но в связи с проблемами со здоровьем, вернулась. В  2009 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Гулмира начала свой бизнес в торговле товарами широкого потребления на рынке со стартовой суммой 17,000 сом (KGS) . Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Гулмира сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 10,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Гулмира обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100.000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Гулмира планирует вложить в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Gulmira is 48 years old and has two daughters. Starting in the year 2000 Gulmira worked in a financial company where she earned a low salary. Following her divorce with her husband, after which she was the sole provider for her children, Gulmira decided to travel to Russia to find work but because of health problems she returned. In 2009 in search of a source of income for her family she used an initial investment of 17,000 som (KGS) to start her own business selling consumer goods at market.Thanks to her persistence and hard work Gulmira was able to expand her business and she now earns a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS). Her inventory is currently limited, so Gulmira turned to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a 100,000 som (KGS) loan. She plans to invest the income she earns into further development of the business.

loans.use: expand her inventory

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, todos ellos trabajan, por su parte apoya a su esposo en la agricultura quien siempre se a dedicado al cultivo de maíz, no tienen un horario establecido pero a través de este trabajo a logrado mantener a su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertir en insumos agrícolas como el abono, herbicidas, esta compra le permitirá obtener lo necesario para trabajar en la tierra y recibir una buena producción.
El objetivo de María es aumentar sus cultivos y darle lo mejor a sus hijos ayudándoles a superarse.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and three children. They all work, but her part consists of helping her husband who is a farmer. They have always grown corn and have never worked on a set schedule. Through this work, María has been able to sustain her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to invest in farming supplies such as compost and herbicides. This purchase will enable her to obtain what she needs to work the land and achieve good production. María's goals are to increase her crops, provide the best for her children, and help them excel.

loans.use: to buy compost and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paper, dye, wire and artificial flowers.

loans.name: Ana Deisy

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a vender ropa de forma ambulante, vive en casa de un tío con su esposo y dos hijos, ella sale a vender todos los días de la semana de forma ambulante, visitando los clientes de la zona cercana.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa para damas y niños, blusas, ropa interior, trajes, faldas, este préstamo le ayudara a Ana a disponer de efectivo para crecer en el negocio.
El objetivo de Ana es a través de los préstamos poder crecer en el negocio y en un futuro tener con su propia casa.
texts.en:
Ana sells clothing door-to-door. She lives in her uncle's house with her husband and two children. She goes out every day to sell, visiting customers in nearby areas. 

She is asking for a loan to buy clothing for women and children - blouses, underwear, suits, and skirts. This loan will help her to line up enough cash to grow her business.

Ana's goal with the loans is to be able to grow her business and buy her own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women and children - blouses, underwear, suits and skirts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tailoring materials

loans.name: Rohat

texts.ru: Рохат проживает в городе Худжанд. Ей 50 лет. Она разведена. У нее четверо детей. Рохат уже три года как занимается торговлей. Она открыла небольшой продуктовый магазин, где работает продавщицей. Кредит берет для покупки продуктов.
texts.en: Rohat lives in the city of Khujand. She is 50 years old and divorced. She has four children. Rohat has been working in sales for three years. She opened a small grocery store where she works as the sales clerk. She is seeking a loan to buy foodstuffs.

loans.use: Buy foodstuffs

loans.name: Giyosidin

texts.ru: Гиёсидин житель района Шахритус. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. Гиёсидин более четырех лет занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает бахчевые культуры. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян арбуза.
texts.en: Giyosidin lives in the Shahrituz district. He is 25 years old and married. Giyosidin has been farming for over four years. He primarily grows melons. He is requesting a loan for purchase of mineral fertilizers and watermelon seed.

loans.use: Buy mineral fertilizer and watermelon seed

loans.name: Elba Donayra

texts.es: Elba, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en una aldea del municipio de Omoa con sus dos hijos y su esposo. Hace 6 años que se dedica a vender mercadería a domicilio y por pedidos a través de catálogos. Vende productos Avon entre ellos desinfectantes, ropa, calzado, champú, cosméticos, etc. todo lo distribuye de acuerdo a pedidos. El préstamo que solicita es de 6,000 y utilizara para surtir de productos y cumplir con los pedidos, ya que comprando por mayor cantidad ella obtiene mejores ganancias. Su meta es ayudar a su familia con los gastos básicos y que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Elba is 25 years old and lives in a neighborhood in the town of Omoa with her husband and two children. For the past six years, she has been selling merchandise from her home and by ordering through catalogs. She sells disinfectants and Avon products such as clothing, shoes, shampoo, cosmetics, and other items. Everything she distributes is based on her orders.

The loan she is requesting is in the amount of 6,000 HNL. The money will be used to restock with products so that she can fulfill her orders. By purchasing in bulk quantities, she will be able earn better income. Her goal is to help her family with basic expenses and provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to buy disinfectants, clothing, shoes, shampoo, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.name: Carolina Lisset

texts.es:
Carolina, se dedica a la venta de sandalias y de ropa nueva, vive en casa de un hermano con su esposo y cinco hijos su esposo es fontanero, con esto le ayuda a ella para cubrir los gastos de la casa, Carolina sale a vender de forma ambulante por la zona cercana.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva para salir a revender, blusas, faldas, ropa interior, pantalones, camisas, vestidos, esta inversión le ayudara a tener surtido el negocio y atender de mejor manera la demanda.
El objetivo de ella es fortalecer su fuente de ingreso para ayudar a sus hijos con los gastos necesarios de alimentación y salud.
texts.en: Carolina works selling sandals and new clothing.  She lives in her brother's house with her husband and five children.  Her husband is a plumber, and helps her cover the household expenses.  Carolina goes out to sell in the area nearby.  She is requesting a loan to buy new clothing to resell, blouses, skirts, underwear, pants, shirts, suits.  This investment will help her to keep her business supplied and to meet the demand better.  Her objective is to strengthen her source of income so as to help her children with necessary expenses for food and health.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, underwear, pants, shirts, suits.

loans.name: Azizbek

texts.ru: Азизибек житель района Шахритус. Он женат. Ему 30 лет. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам он занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур на участке у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян арбуза и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Azizbek lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 30 years old and married. His wife works in the collective farm. He cultivates melons on the plot of land at his home. He has been in this business for seven years. He is taking out the loan to buy watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
El señor Porfirio tiene 48 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Itá, se dedica al servicio de alquileres hace más de 12 años. Comenta que tiene muy buena clientela ya que el ofrece muy buenos productos a sus clientes.
Porfirio es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha por darle a su familia todo lo que necesitan para tener una vida digna y decorosa. El solicita el préstamo para la compra de más sillas, cubiertos, etc., con lo cual podrá seguir aumentando sus insumos para poder seguir alquilando.
El señor Porfirio es muy responsable y profesional en su trabajo, busca siempre la excelencia en su actividad y agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y a Kiva por la oportunidad recibida para compartir con todos su vida profesional.
texts.en:
Sr. Porfirio is 48 years old and lives in the city of Itá. He has been providing rental services for more than 12 years. He says that he has a very good clientele since he offers good products to his customers.

Porfirio is a hardworking and enterprising person who strives to give his family everything they need to have a decent and dignified life. He is requesting a loan to buy more chairs, silverware, and other items. This will increase his inventory of supplies so that he can continue offering them for rent. Sr. Porfirio is very responsible and professional in his work. He always seeks excellence in his business. Porfirio is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the opportunity he has received so that he can partake in everything his professional life has to offer.

loans.use: to buy chairs, silverware, and other items.

loans.name: Walter Ulises

texts.es:
Walter, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y tres hijos de 8, 5 y 2 años de edad, el trabaja en la agricultura desde hace doce años, aprendió con sus padres actualmente trabaja en lo propio.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tres mil plantas de chile, abono y foliares, con este préstamo tendrá el dinero necesario para comprarse los insumos que necesita para obtener una buena productividad.
El objetivo de él es tener una fuente de trabajo que le permita generar a su familia las condiciones estables.
texts.en:
Walter is 30 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children (ages 8, 5, and 2). He has worked in agriculture for 12 years. Walter learned the trade from his parents and now works on his own.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy 3,000 chili pepper plants, compost, and foliar fertilizers. This loan will provide the necessary funds required to buy these supplies so that he can achieve good productivity. His goal is to have a source of work that will enable him to provide stable conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy chili pepper plants, compost, and foliar fertilizers.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal “El Progreso” está conformado por 15 emprendedores que se dedican al rubro del comercio, específicamente venta de pan amasado, artesanía, venta de comida, almacén, venta de verduras, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de San Antonio.
Alicia quien en la foto se encuentra ubicada en el centro del Banco Comunal, vistiendo pantalones azules, polera negra y encima una chaqueta color café, usando una cartera color café, usa su pelo suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de las costuras, haciendo buzos para todos los colegios en su ciudad, se dedica a este rubro desde hace 6 años.
Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Santiago ya que es más barato y tiene más variedad en productos.
Con el crédito comprará mercadería.
Sus metas son poder independizarse para tener su propio taller, para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Alicia vive junto a su marido y tres hijos y uno de sus sueños son llegar a ser una microempresaria para manejar su negocio y sus ganancias.
Alicia está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito y servicios prestados por Fondo Esperanza. Además comenta que se siente muy cómoda con las reuniones y grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que existe generosidad y unidad.
San Antonio es un puerto de la región de Valparaíso, siendo esta una de sus principales características, ubicado en el litoral central de Chile. Se desarrolla en forma importante la pesca y venta de pescados y mariscos. Pese a la actividad portuaria y comercial del puerto, existe un alto índice de cesantía.
texts.en: This communal bank is made up of 15 entrepreneurs who work in the field of commerce, specifically: the sale of doughy bread, craft production, food sales, a grocery store, vegetable sales, and other services.  They all come from the city of San Antonio.  Alicia is seen in the photo in the communal bank centre, wearing blue pants, a black sweater and a brown jacket over that. She is carrying a brown handbag and has straight hair.  She works in the field of sewing, making tracksuits for the students in her city.  She has worked in this field for 6 years.  Her merchanidse is purchased in the city of Santiago because it is cheaper and there is a greater variety of products.  With the loan she will buy merchandise.  Her goals are to become independent and have her own workshop, to generate more income, and thus achieve a better quality of life.  Alicia lives with her husband and three children.  One of her deams is to become a microentrepreneur to manage her business and her earnings.  Alicia is very happy and grateful for the loan and services made by Fondo Esperanza.  She also states that she feels very content with the meetings and the group at the communal bank, as generosity and unity exist there.  San Antonio is a port in the Valparaiso region, which is one of its principal characteristics, located in the central coastal region of Chile.  Fishing and the sale of fish are developing in an important way.  Because of its port acitivity and commercial activity  there is a high rate of unemployment.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сураё проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 29 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Сураё занимается растениеводством. В этой области она пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян арбуза и топлива.
texts.en: Surayo lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 29 years old, married and has two children. Surayo does plant cultivation. She has been in this business for five years. She is taking out the loan to buy watermelon seeds and fuel.

loans.use: to buy watermelon seeds and fuel.

loans.name: Guljamol

texts.ru: Гулчамол проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 31 год. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках заграницей. Сама Гулчамол занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности она занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа топлива и удобрений.
texts.en:
Guljamol lives in the Shahrituz district.  She is 31 years old, married, and has three children.  Her husband currently works abroad.  

Guljamol sows agricultural crops, and has been involved in this type of activity for the past five years.  She is taking a loan to purchase fuel and fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase fuel and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед житель района Шахритус. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам он занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается 25 лет. Кредит берет для закупа топлива.
texts.en:
Jamshed lives in the Shahrituz district.  He is 48 years old, married, and has three children.  His wife works on a dehkan farm.

Jamshed grows plants.  He has been involved in this type of activity for the past 25 years.  He is taking a loan to buy fuel.

loans.use: to buy fuel.

loans.name: Gie Ugpr 6 Takku Liggey Sam Group

texts.fr: Le groupement UGPR 6 s'active dans le commerce de tissus, d'habits et de produits de mercerie.ll se compose de 5 femmes toutes mariées et mères de famille.La présidente ( au milieu avec la main tendue) est mère de cinq enfants dont les quatre vont à l'école.Elle tient une cantine devant son domicile et y vend des articles de mercerie. Le groupe sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter des fils , des boutons, des tissus et autres produits divers.
texts.en:
The group "UGPR 6" is active in the commerce of fabrics, clothing, and sewing supplies. It is composed of five women who are all married and mothers with families. The president (in the middle of the photo with her hand raised) is the mother of five children, of whom four are in school. 

She has a stall in front of her home and sells sewing supplies there. The group is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy thread, buttons, fabrics, and various other items.

loans.use: to buy thread, buttons, fabrics, and various other items.

loans.name: Naimjon

texts.ru: Наимчон проживает в городе Худжанд. Он женат. Ему 28 лет. У него один ребенок. Нимчон предоставляет услугу. Он развозит пассажиров по маршруту №55. В этой области он работает восемь лет. Кредит берет для приобретения легкового автомобиля.
texts.en:
Naimjon lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 28 years old, married, and has one child.

Naimjon provides passenger transportation services along route no. 55.  He has been working in this area for the past eight years.  He is taking a loan for the purchase of a passenger car.

loans.use: to buy a passenger car.

loans.name: Natal'ya

texts.ru: Наталья проживает в районе Яван. Ей 31 год. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Наталья арендует торговую точку на рынке, где она занимается торговлей подержанной одежды. Этим видом деятельности она занимается два года. Кредит берет для покупки одежды.
texts.en:
Natal'ya lives in the Yavan region.  She is 31 years old, married, and has two children.

Natal'ya rents a store at the market, where she sells used clothing.  She has been involved in this type of activity for two years.  She is taking a loan to buy clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: 03.5.90 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vui works in agriculture. She raises poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Vui is 47 years old and married with two children. She is the leader of a six-member group, the 90 Quảng Hưng Solidarity group. Vui lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Vui's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Vui has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Vui faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Vui hopes to build a new house. She hopes that her family will be healthy and happy and that her children will find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle

loans.name: Arslon

texts.ru: Арслон три года как занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур. Ему 23 года. Он женат. Кредит берет для закупа семян и топлива.
texts.en: Arslon has been cultivating melons for three years now. He is 23 years old and married. He is taking out the loan to buy seeds and fuel.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fuel.

loans.name: Takhmina

texts.ru:
Тахмине 26 лет, замужем, воспитывает 3 дочерей - 6,4 и 2-х лет. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Тахмина на протяжении 5 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний  день в хозяйстве Тахмины имеется 2 коровы, 2 лошади и 1,80 га земли, где она выращивает перец и многолетние травы.  Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Тахмина обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку нетели.  Доходы от кредита Тахмина планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Takhmina is 26 years old, she is married and is raising three daughters who are six, four and two years old. As an additional source of income for her family Takhmina has been doing field crop cultivation and animal husbandry for the last five years, a business she started with an amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Today Takhmina's livestock consists of two cows, two horses and 1,80 hectares of land where she grows peppers and perennial grasses. The sale of milk and dairy products bring around 5,000 som a month.

With the goal to further grow her business Takhmina has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 30,000 KGS to buy heifers. She plans to invest the income from the loan into further increase of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Taman Indah Group

texts.en:
Taman Indah group, located in rural areas mostly, have a farming business and raise livestock. One business is raising pigs. With the number of group members at 8, the group got a loan of Rp.11,000,000. 

Ni Wayan, the head of the group, tries to keep different types of pig. She's using the loan to buy three types of local pigs which will be sold for pigroll(barbeque). Pigs will be maintained for 2 months, then sold again. Profits from the sale will be set aside and the capital will be used to buy more pigs again. Ni Wayan hopes this effort will be smooth so that she will be able to realize her dream to make her kitchen more spacious.

loans.use: to buy three types of local pigs to be sold to pig bolsters

loans.name: Altankhuar

texts.en: Altankhuar, 44, sells the meat and skins of livestock to customers. This business is popular in the Mongolian market. She has been running her business since 2006. She buys the skins from the rural households and herders and sells them to the customers in urban areas. Bringing the livestock meat and skins to the city is very expensive. She lives with her son and daughter in an apartment in Kherlen, an eastern city in Mongolia. Her daughter works as a vendor in the grocery store and her son attends the secondary school. Altankhuar is requesting a loan to buy the building materials to renovate her apartment rooms. She is planning to replace the windows of her rooms with better insulated windows. It is very important to reduce the heat loss and emissions through the windows. In the winter, she uses the furnace with coal to warm her apartment. But using the coal creates too much air pollution. Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world.  This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40C (-40F) even in the cities.  Also, in the summer, many parts of the country are extremely cold and are known to have snow storms. Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm.  In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems. We believe that together we can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health.

loans.use: to cover the cost of replacing windows in her house and reduce heat loss and emissions.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a single man who has been doing welding for the last five years. He plans to purchase a welding machine using the requested loan of Ksh 15000. John lives in a rental house that has both electricity and piped water. He dreams of hiring employees in future. He joined Yehu to get access to loans to boost his business. He serves the general public.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine.

loans.name: Carmidas Group

texts.es:
Carmidas es un grupo solidario del municipio de García, Nuevo Leon. Ellas están compuestas por 7 mujeres emprendedoras y actualmente están cumpliendo con su segundo ciclo en Credituyo. Ellas escogieron el nombre de Carmidas porque este es el nombre de la calle en donde viven la gran mayoría de las integrantes del grupo. Ellas se conocen desde hace casí 3 años, que fue cuando todas se vinieron a vivir a esta colonia.

María Lidia una de las mujeres del grupo. Ella tiene 33 años y es casada. Tiene 3 hijos, una de 9 años y otro de 6, los cuales actualmente están estudiando en la primaria, mientras que el más pequeño tiene apenas 10 meses. Maria Lidia desde hace 3 años se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer emprendedora. Ella comenzó a vender snacks para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa. Sin embargo, ultimamente ha buscado comenzar nuevos negocios. Es por eso que ella solicitó el crédito para comprar globos, peluches, moños, confetti, papel de china y otros artículos para vender arreglos para el día de las madres y las graduaciones escolares que comenzarán en junio. María Lidia espera que con la ayuda de este crédito y con los ingresos que obtendrá por la venta de los arreglos pueda proveerle a sus hijos el mejor futuro posible.
texts.en:
Carmidas is a communal bank in the town of García, Nuevo Leon.  It is comprised of seven women entrepreneurs who are currently completing their second loan cycle in Credituyo.  They chose the name "Carmidas" because it is the name of the street where the majority of the members lives.  They have known each other for almost three years, ever since they came to live in this colony.

María Lidia, one of the members of the group, is 33 years old, married and has three children, a nine-year-old and six-year-old who are in elementary school, and the youngest, who is just ten months old.  For three years, María Lidia has been known as an enterprising woman.  She began selling snacks to help her husband with the household expenses.  However, lately she is looking to go into new businesses.  She has requested a loan to buy balloons, stuffed animals, ribbons, confetti, tissue paper and other articles for arrangements for Mother's Day and school graduations that will start in June.  María Lidia hopes the help from the loan and the income from selling arrangements will give her children the best future possible.

loans.use: To buy articles to make arrangements.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en: Leonila, 56, is married and has three children. She resides at Guba, Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Leonila owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting root crops like sweet potato and cassava to sell. She's been in this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 6,761 PHP from her farming business. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. In 2010, Leonila joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Leonila wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and other beauty items and chemicals.

loans.name: Thermie

texts.en: Thermie, 23, is married and resides at Capucao, Ozamis City: Philippines. Thermie owns and operate a farm, planting and harvesting corn and coconut to sell. She's been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP from her business. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and to cover the costs of corn planting. In 2012, Thermie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Thermie plans to make improvements to her house and to have a baby.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cost paid for corn planting

loans.name: Las Reynas Group

texts.es:
Peculiar nombre para un grupo, Las Reynas. Vecinas emprendedoras que se hacen llamar así debido a que mutuamente se dan ánimos para salir adelante.
Rosa Isela, es vecina de ellas y sabia que formaban parte de un crédito grupal y se intereso y conoció del compromiso y beneficio que represento para cada una de sus integrantes. Ella se dedica a la venta de snack en su domicilio. Entonces con la idea de hacer crecer su negocio mediante la inversión, se acercó a las Reynas para que fuera incluida en la renovación del grupo.
Rosy, como le llaman, esta convencida de que podrá inyectar a su negocio variedad y mercancía para tener cada día más clientes.
texts.en:
A peculiar name for a group is "Las Reynas" (The Queens).  They are enterprising neighbors who have given themselves this label to cheer each other on to get ahead.

Rosa Isela, one of the neighbors of the communal bank, approached the group and learned about the commitment and benefits it represented for each of its members.  She sells snacks from her home and, with the idea of growing her business through investment, she asked "Las Reynas" to be included when the group planned to renew.

Rosy, as they call her, is convinced that she can introduce variety and merchandise into her business so her customer base grows daily.

loans.use: To buy products and goods for snacks.

loans.name: Carmen Doris

texts.es:
Carmen es una joven de 27 años de edad, la cual vive al lado de su esposo y sus 2 pequeños hijos, por los cuales ella trabaja mucho por sacarlos adelante con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al trabajo como agricultor. Anteriormente ambos trabajaban cultivando la tierra, pero debido a que sus hijos son pequeños ahora Carmen trabaja en su hogar. Su vivienda se encuentra en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, playas hermosas, se desarrolla la agricultura y sobre todo el cultivo de maíz, algodón, entre otros. Con mucho esfuerzo, ahorro y sobre todo entusiasmo Carmen inicio su negocio de venta de abarrotes desde hace 9 meses, en los cuales al inicio le fue un poco difícil pero con el pasar de los días fue mejorando, tomo la decisión de tener su negocio porque necesitaba estar al lado de sus pequeños ya que cuando trabajaba en el campo junto a su esposo no podía ver a sus hijos casi todo el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicada, sobre todo porque es amable con los clientes.

Carmen está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio como arroz, azúcar, fideos, enlatados, confitados, golosinas, entre otros,  de esta manera el podrá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes  y así poder mejorar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando  para hacer realidad su más grande sueño: “Darle una buena educación a sus hijos y tener un negocio mas grande”.
texts.en:
Carmen, 27, is a young woman who lives with her husband and two small children.  She works hard to provide for them and support her husband, who is a farmer.  Previously, both of them worked the fields, but since their children are small Carmen now works at home.  Their house is in the city of Imperial, which is known for its warm climate, beautiful beaches and agriculture, especially growing crops such as corn and cotton.  Through much effort, savings and, especially, enthusiasm, Carmen started her business selling groceries nine months ago.  It was a little difficult at first but over time business has gotten better.  She decided to set up her own business because she needed to be near her young ones, since working alongside her husband did not allow her to spend much time at home.  She believes business is going well because she is very dedicated and kind to the customers.

Carmen is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since through their help she can buy more merchandise for her store, such as rice, sugar, noodles, canned goods, confectionery, sweets and other items.  This will add more variety for her customers, increase her income and improve her family's lifestyle, which will encourage her to continue striving to make her greatest dream come true: "To give her children a good education and expand her business".

loans.use: To buy merchandise (rice, sugar, noodles, canned goods, confectionery, sweets, and other items).

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander  tiene 31 años de edad, es padre de familia, agricultor, muy  trabajador y vive en una comunidad  situada en  la zona Sur de Costa Rica, ubicada en Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas, llamada La Danta.  La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.

El está solicitando un préstamo de ₡1.000.000 (un millón de colones), para la compra de semilla de maíz,  abono y fungicidas para proteger sus cultivos durante el proceso de producción .  Con estos abonos, Alexander  aumentará la capacidad que posee el suelo de absorber los distintos elementos nutritivos y con los fungicidas que utilizara gracias a este préstamo también evitara que aparezcan hongos en sus plantaciones,  así brindara productos de calidad a sus clientes,  y además podrá hacer frente a todas sus obligaciones y pagos para así sacar adelante a su familia.
El es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal denla Danta S.A, una de las 110 empresas de crédito comunal de Costa Rica y este es su segundo crédito.
texts.en:
Alexander, 31, is a father and a very hard-working farmer who lives in a community in southern Costa Rica, located in Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas, called La Danta.  The local economy is based on agricultural activities, especially crop-farming of tubers, coffee, corn and beans and livestock farming.

He is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 CRC to buy corn seeds, fertilizer and fungicides to protect his crops during the production process.  With these supplies, Alexander will increase the capacity of his land to absorb the different nutrients and make use of the fungicides bought with the loan to avoid fungi on his plantation.  This means he will have quality produce for his clients, and will be able to pay off debts and help his family get ahead.

He is a member of the communal bank Danta S.A., one of the 110 communal banks in Costa Rica.  This is his second loan.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds and supplies.

loans.name: Luis Brayams

texts.es:
Luis es una joven de 23 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y sus 2 pequeño hijos a los cuales ama muchísimo y por quienes da la vida y se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante y darles una vida de calidad y sobre todo con mucho amor y cariño. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, entre otros. Luis es muy trabajador y optimista y por ello se animo a tener su negocio de venta de salchipapas, pollo broster y salchipollos, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 4 horas al día, su esposa lo apoya mucho ya que lo ayuda en la preparación de los platillos y la preparación de las salsas;  en las mañanas Luis trabaja en una empresa de productos naturales, alrededor de 8 horas; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy trabajador, tiene buena sazón para la preparación de los platillos y sobre todo es amable y responsable.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mesas, sillas, bancos, para poder dar más comodidad para sus clientes; de esta manera el podrá brindar un mejor servicio y mejorar sus ingresos, para así seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación para sus hijos y sobre todo para darle una vida de calidad”.
texts.en:
Luis, 23, is a young man who lives with his wife and two small children, who he loves very much and works hard for to provide them with a quality lifestyle with a lot of love and affection.  His house is located in the city of Imperial, which is known for its warm climate and agricultural activity, especially growing crops such as cotton and corn.  Luis is a very hard worker and optimistic, and therefore he came up with the idea of selling salchipapas (hot dogs and fried potatoes), broasted chicken and salchipollos.  He spends four hours a day at his work and his wife helps a lot with cooking and preparation of sauces.  In the morning, Luis works at a natural product company for eight hours.  He believes his business is going well because he is a hard worker, a good cook and, above all else, is kind and responsible.

Luis is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he can buy tables, chairs and benches for his customers.  This will allow him to provide better customer service and improve his income, so he can continue striving toward making his grandest dream come true: "To give his children a good education and, especially, a good quality of life".

loans.use: To buy tables, chairs, and benches.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian is a divorced woman with seven children, two of whom are in school. She has been operating a grocery for over 10 years, selling at the market to the local residents. Lilian dreams of opening a cereal shop in future. She has rented a house that has both electricity and piped water. She describes seasonality to be her major challenge, and her greatest monthly expense goes to food and school fees. With the loan of Ksh 30,000, she plans to buy sacks of potatoes and vegetables for sale.

loans.use: to buy sacks of potatoes and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Nenencia

texts.en:
Nenencia is 49 years-old, married, and the mother of three children; she is from Carmen Annex, Ozamiz City. Nenencia has been in the business of making and selling ice cream in the local community for over 30 years, and she earns approximately PHP 8,000 a month.

Nenencia is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase ice cream ingredients such as cassava flour, sugar, fresh milk, flavor, food color, and salt.

In 2008, Nenencia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Nenencia plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ice cream ingredients such as cassava flour, sugar, fresh milk, flavor, food color, and salt

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Samina's Group

texts.en:
Samina is married and has a daughter and a son. She is a very efficient lady and performs her household duties very well. Her husband operates a video game shop in the market and provides community children the gaming facility. He charges a very reasonable amount for playing the games; that’s why he has a lot of children as clients who come to his video game shop regularly to enjoy playing video games.  

Samina is also very supportive and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. The income she earns enables her to pay her daughter’s school fees.  She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her husband who wants to buy the latest video games for his gaming shop. This will help him to make more profits from his business. He is very experienced in his business and Samina is confident about his business success as a result of this loan investment.

loans.use: To buy latest video games for gaming shop.

loans.name: Tamela

texts.en:
Tamela is 47 years-old; she lives in a small village with her family. Her brother, Israpil, is a pensioner and her mother is a pensioner as well. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of land, where tomatoes and corn are grown. Total average monthly income of the family is 600 Lari.

Tamela requested a loan for the family agricultural business. She wants to rent more land and sow more products. With this loan, she will be able to purchase fertilizer and cultivate her own and rented lands.  She will hire workers; they will help her to sow more vegetables (potato, haricot, cabbage) and fruits. Thus, she will get more agricultural products. Tamela will sell harvested product in nearby villages. This will increase the income of the family. With the increased amount of profit, she will be able to improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en: Rhoda is a married woman with three children, two of whom are in school. Her children are between the ages of three and 12 years. For the last five years, she has operated a grocery selling as retail, and she aspires to expand this business to reach more customers. High transportation costs and seasonality of some goods is a major challenge facing her business. She lives in a rental house that has both electricity and piped water. The loan will help her purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en: Nida is a married woman with two children. She is 53 years-old, residing at Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Nida owns and operates a general store selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been in this business for one year. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase new items such as candies, milk, shampoo, soaps, canned goods, noodles, sugar, coffee, etc. In 2006, Nida joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Nida wants to build house and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, canned goods, noodles, sugar, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Khatuna

texts.en:
Khatuna is 43 years-old. She lives in a small village with her family including her husband, Khvicha, who is busy with agriculture and mother-in-law, who is a pensioner. The family has run an agricultural business for almost 15 years. They have two milking cows and produce cheese. Also, they have six sheep and sell lambs and wool on season. They sell cheese and other dairy food on the local open market. Khatuna is busy with teaching; she is a teacher in the local school. Her pupils love her very much.

Khatuna requested a loan for purchasing a mowing land. Thus, she will be able to decrease the costs of the dairy farm, as she will make hay from the mowed grass for feeding the cows, instead of buying it at an expensive price. As a result of this Kiva loan, the income of the family will increase. With the increased amount of profit, she will be able to reinvest in family agricultural business to expand it. Also, they will increase spending on family members' daily needs and the living conditions of the family will improve. Khatuna hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is 22 years-old; she lives in a small village with her family including her husband, Levan, who works in a state agency, two children (three and one year-old), parents-in-law, and grandfather. The family runs an agricultural business. They have two milking cows; every day they produce dairy food (cheese, yogurt) and sell it in the local open market. Total average monthly income of the family is 1100 Lari. 

With the requested loan Nana will repair the cattle-shed because the existing one is small and old. In the new building, she will be able to keep more calves and cows. Due to this fact, she will be able to increase production of dairy food and she will get additional income. Nana is a very hard working woman; she keeps livestock in good condition and takes good care of them. With the increased income, she will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business. This will positively influence the income of the family. Due to the above-mentioned, the living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: To repair the cattle-shed

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is still in the farming business and it's doing great. She has applied for a second loan of KES 50,000 from KADET LTD, and she plans to use it to purchase fertilizers and pesticides, so as to improve the harvest and use the profit for expanding the business. She hopes in future to have a wholesale for onion and tomatoes. She is a very hardworking lady.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en: Dorcas is a woman who operates a shoe and accessory selling business; a business she has been operating for the last six years. She is selling to the general public. She describes low customer turn out to be her major challenge. Dorcas has rented a house that has both electricity and piped water. Food and school fees are her greatest monthly expenses. She joined Yehu to get access to loans. With the loan of Ksh 30000, she plans to purchase stock of shoes and accessories for sale.

loans.use: to purchase stock of shoes and accessories for sale.

loans.name: Iamze

texts.en:
Iamze is 41 years old; she lives in a small village district of Kaspi Region with her family.
